title: LAST CHANCE: Win Rotor’s lightest-ever carbon crankset!
content:
If you’re looking to lighten up your road or gravel bike and gain efficiency on the climbs, look no further than the ROTOR Aldhu carbon cranks and their oval chainrings. How light are they? The 172mm arms with 52/36 chainring combo weighs in at just 523g! The arms alone are just 260g! We’re giving away

The post LAST CHANCE: Win Rotor’s lightest-ever carbon crankset! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
